item.title: On basis functions and stochastic processes
item.description:
This is an experiment writing down equations for this little blog where I’m interested in submitting some basic ideas $$\mathcal{GP}(\bm{x}) = (n+1)^{-1} $$

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown1 syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
